description.value: The sound you make uplifts those who hear you. Until the end of your next turn, a target makes attribute rolls with 1 boon if you whispered, 2 boons if you spoke, or 3 boons if you shouted.

system.casting: at level 1, 2 at level 3, or 4 at level 7, on your turn, no action required when you lack the confused, controlled, stunned, and unconscious afflictions
system.target: Each creature in a Size 3 space centered on you if you whisper, a Size 10 space if you speak, or a Size 60 space if you shout
